com.tweetcrawl.agents.utils

Class TweetCrawlerLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tweetcrawl.agents.utils.TweetCrawlerLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TweetCrawlerLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Logger used by the project to log messages, errors and making popups if necessary to inform the user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • info

        public javax.swing.JDialog info(java.lang.String message,
                                java.lang.String title,
                                boolean canBeClosed)
        Allows to log an informative message in the TweetCrawlerLogger and to display it.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to log and display
        title - the title to give to the display popup
        canBeClosed - true if the popup can be closed by the user, false otherwise
        Returns:
        JDialog as the popup used to display the message that can be used to close programmatically the popup
